page.title: 09THE WHEATLEY FAMILY, REIGATE
page.content: In our family, there are my mother and father, my brother John, aged fifteen, at boarding school at Seaford College, and myself, aged twelve, at Micklefield{School}in Reigate. We have three much loved grandparents living elsewhere. Mummy is a{housewife,}and she is also involved in many charities,-the N.S.P.C.C; the R.N.L.I; Cancer Relief, etc. She has meetings and entertains friends. She rides and goes to keep fit and aerobic classes. Daddy is a {pilot}with British Caledonian. I am at school until 3.30 p.m. then I may have{activity}classes such as ballet, tennis, gym club or riding. Later,we have{supper}such as chips and beefburgers. Sometimes Mummy sews or Daddy decorates the house. I finish my prep and may watch television with my parents before bedtime at 9.00 p.m.
